value.name: Royal rumble: Jersey blockade threatens potato shortage
value.description: Peter Le Maistre, president of the Jersey Farmers Union, hoped that the late ferry would still be able to make a journey, saying it “would be very inconvenient if the lifeline was interrupted”.
